title: Order Details
description: This class is used to capture order details

xdm:activationFee.title: Activation Fee
xdm:activationFee.description: Activation Fees associated with an order

xdm:backorderValue.title: Backorder Value
xdm:backorderValue.description: Backorder Value associated with any backordered items included in an order

xdm:cartItemsCount.title: Cart Items Count
xdm:cartItemsCount.description: Number of items in a cart or an order

xdm:coupons.title: Coupons
xdm:coupons.description: An list of coupons included in an order

xdm:couponValue.title: Coupon Value
xdm:couponValue.description: The value of the coupons applied to an order

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for cost and pricing

xdm:deliveryFee.title: Delivery Fee
xdm:deliveryFee.description: The delivery fee applied to an order

xdm:depositAmount.title: Deposit Amount
xdm:depositAmount.description: The deposit amount applied to an order

xdm:discountValue.title: Discount Value
xdm:discountValue.description: The discount value applied to an order

xdm:discounts.title: Discounts
xdm:discounts.description: The list of discounts applied to an order

xdm:giftCardValue.title: Gift Card Value
xdm:giftCardValue.description: The value of gift cards applied to an order

xdm:itemTotalAmount.title: Item Total Amount
xdm:itemTotalAmount.description: The total amount for an item included in an order. This is useful for scenarios where multiples can be added to the cart and you would like to capture a total for each line item

xdm:orderTotal.title: Order Total
xdm:orderTotal.description: The total value of an order

xdm:purchaseID.title: Purchase ID
xdm:purchaseID.description: The purchase ID of an order.

xdm:otherTaxAmount.title: Other Tax Amount
xdm:otherTaxAmount.description: Where applicable, other taxes applied to an order

xdm:paymentDue.title: Payment Due
xdm:paymentDue.description: When there are multiple payments due for an order, this value should be used to capture the amount due today

xdm:promoCodes.title: Promo Codes
xdm:promoCodes.description: The list of promo codes applied to an order

xdm:promoCodeValue.title: Promo Code Value
xdm:promoCodeValue.description: The promo code value applied to an order

xdm:purchaseOrderNumber.title: Purchase Order Number
xdm:purchaseOrderNumber.description: This value should be used to record in scenarios where there is a customer purchase order number tied to an order

xdm:recurringCharge.title: Recurring Charge
xdm:recurringCharge.description: When there are multiple payments due for an order, this value should be used to capture the recurring charge associated with the order

xdm:shippingAmount.title: Shipping Amount
xdm:shippingAmount.description: The shipping amount associated with an order

xdm:shippingMethod.title: Shipping Method
xdm:shippingMethod.description: The shipping method associated with an order

xdm:subtotalWithTax.title: Subtotal With Tax
xdm:subtotalWithTax.description: The subtotal including tax associated with an order

xdm:subtotalWithoutTax.title: Subtotal Without Tax
xdm:subtotalWithoutTax.description: The subtotal with added taxes associated with an order

xdm:salesTaxAmount.title: Sales Tax Amount
xdm:salesTaxAmount.description: The sales tax amount associated with an order

xdm:tipAmount.title: Tip Amount
xdm:tipAmount.description: The tip amount associated with an order
